com.samsung.android.sdk.chord

Interface SchordManager.StatusListener

  • Enclosing class:
    SchordManager

    public static interface SchordManager.StatusListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for Chord Manager events.
    A listener implementation can be registered with start().
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    2.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ERROR_START_FAIL
      Error code - Chord failed to start.
      static int ERROR_UNEXPECTED_STOP
      Error code - Chord terminated unexpectedly.
      static int NETWORK_DISCONNECTED
      Reason code - The network is disconnected.
      static int STARTED_BY_RECONNECTION
      Reason code - The network has reconnected.
      static int STARTED_BY_USER
      Reason code - Chord started successfully with the start() method.
      static int STOPPED_BY_USER
      Reason code - Chord stopped successfully with the stop() method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onStarted(String nodeName, int reason)
      Called when Chord starts successfully.
      void onStopped(int reason)
      Called when Chord stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • onStarted

        void onStarted(String nodeName,
             int reason)
        Called when Chord starts successfully. Also called when Chord starts upon reconnection.
        After this method is called, channel operations can be performed.
        Parameters:
        nodeName - The own node name
        reason - The reason Chord started. The valid reason values are:
        STARTED_BY_USER and STARTED_BY_RECONNECTION.
        Since:
        1.0

      • onStopped

        void onStopped(int reason)
        Called when Chord stopped.
        Parameters:
        reason - The reason Chord stopped. The valid reason values are:
        STOPPED_BY_USER,
        NETWORK_DISCONNECTED,
        ERROR_UNEXPECTED_STOP,
        ERROR_START_FAIL
        Since:
        1.5
